meta_index_desc: Professional eyelash extensions and beauty services in Bratislava. Enhance your natural beauty with Alexa Lashes.

footer_alexa_lashes_desc: Beauty, quality, and your satisfaction come first.
banner_title: Discover the beauty of your eyes at Alexa Lashes
banner_desc: Treat yourself to professional eyelash care that highlights your uniqueness.
home_welcome_desc: We are here to fulfill your dreams of perfect eyelashes. At Alexa Lashes, we emphasize quality, hygiene, and an individual approach to each client.
benefits_1_desc: Our certified team takes care of your comfort and flawless results.
benefits_2_desc: We use only the highest quality and safe products on the market.
benefits_3_desc: With us, you not only beautify your eyelashes but also perfectly relax.

cta_title: Are you ready for a transformation at Alexa Lashes?
